moves.name: Spore
moves.desc: Causes the target to fall asleep.
moves.shortDesc: Causes the target to fall asleep.

moves.name: Follow Me
moves.desc: Until the end of the turn, all single-target attacks from the opposing side are redirected to the user. Such attacks are redirected to the user before they can be reflected by Magic Coat or the Magic Bounce Ability, or drawn in by the Lightning Rod or Storm Drain Abilities. Fails if it is not a Double Battle or Battle Royal. This effect is ignored while the user is under the effect of Sky Drop.
moves.shortDesc: The foes' moves target the user on the turn used.

moves.name: Fake Out
moves.desc: Has a 100% chance to make the target flinch. Fails unless it is the user's first turn on the field.
moves.shortDesc: Hits first. First turn out only. 100% flinch chance.

moves.name: Wide Guard
moves.desc: The user and its party members are protected from moves made by other Pokemon, including allies, during this turn that target all adjacent foes or all adjacent Pokemon. This move modifies the same 1/X chance of being successful used by other protection moves, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used, but does not use the chance to check for failure. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Burning Bulwark, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Silk Trap, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn or if this move is already in effect for the user's side.
moves.shortDesc: Protects allies from multi-target moves this turn.

moves.name: Spiky Shield
moves.desc: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn, and Pokemon making contact with the user lose 1/8 of their maximum HP, rounded down. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Burning Bulwark, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Silk Trap, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn.
moves.shortDesc: Protects from moves. Contact: loses 1/8 max HP.

moves.name: Decorate
moves.desc: Raises the target's Attack and Special Attack by 2 stages.
moves.shortDesc: Raises the target's Attack and Sp. Atk by 2.

moves.name: Explosion
moves.desc: The user faints after using this move, even if this move fails for having no target. This move is prevented from executing if any active Pokemon has the Damp Ability.
moves.shortDesc: Hits adjacent Pokemon. The user faints.

moves.name: Coaching
moves.desc: Raises the target's Attack and Defense by 1 stage. Fails if there is no ally adjacent to the user.
moves.shortDesc: Raises an ally's Attack and Defense by 1.

moves.name: Guillotine
moves.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to the target's maximum HP. Ignores accuracy and evasiveness modifiers. This attack's accuracy is equal to (user's level - target's level + 30)%, and fails if the target is at a higher level. Pokemon with the Sturdy Ability are immune.
moves.shortDesc: OHKOs the target. Fails if user is a lower level.

moves.name: Endeavor
moves.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to (target's current HP - user's current HP). The target is unaffected if its current HP is less than or equal to the user's current HP.
moves.shortDesc: Lowers the target's HP to the user's HP.

moves.name: Burning Bulwark
moves.desc: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn, and Pokemon trying to make contact with the user become burned. Non-damaging moves go through this protection. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Burning Bulwark, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Silk Trap, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn.
moves.shortDesc: Protects from damaging attacks. Contact: burn.

moves.name: Water Shuriken
moves.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 35% chance to hit two or three times and a 15% chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times. If the user is an Ash-Greninja with the Battle Bond Ability, this move has a power of 20 and always hits three times.
moves.shortDesc: Usually goes first. Hits 2-5 times in one turn.

moves.name: Taunt
moves.desc: Prevents the target from using non-damaging moves for its next three turns. Pokemon with the Oblivious Ability or protected by the Aroma Veil Ability are immune.
moves.shortDesc: Target can't use status moves its next 3 turns.

moves.name: Quick Guard
moves.desc: The user and its party members are protected from attacks with original or altered priority greater than 0 made by other Pokemon, including allies, during this turn. This move modifies the same 1/X chance of being successful used by other protection moves, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used, but does not use the chance to check for failure. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Burning Bulwark, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Silk Trap, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn or if this move is already in effect for the user's side.
moves.shortDesc: Protects allies from priority attacks this turn.

moves.name: Whirlwind
moves.desc: The target is forced to switch out and be replaced with a random unfainted ally. Fails if the target is the last unfainted Pokemon in its party, or if the target used Ingrain previously or has the Suction Cups Ability.
moves.shortDesc: Forces the target to switch to a random ally.

moves.name: Baneful Bunker
moves.desc: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn, and Pokemon making contact with the user become poisoned. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Burning Bulwark, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Silk Trap, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn.
moves.shortDesc: Protects from moves. Contact: poison.

moves.name: Ruination
moves.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to half of its current HP, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP.
moves.shortDesc: Does damage equal to 1/2 target's current HP.

moves.name: Aqua Jet
moves.desc: No additional effect.
moves.shortDesc: Usually goes first.

moves.name: Final Gambit
moves.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to the user's current HP. If this move is successful, the user faints.
moves.shortDesc: Does damage equal to the user's HP. User faints.

moves.name: Parting Shot
moves.desc: Lowers the target's Attack and Special Attack by 1 stage. If this move is successful, the user switches out even if it is trapped and is replaced immediately by a selected party member. The user does not switch out if the target's Attack and Special Attack stat stages were both unchanged, or if there are no unfainted party members.
moves.shortDesc: Lowers target's Atk, Sp. Atk by 1. User switches.

moves.name: Upper Hand
moves.desc: Has a 100% chance to make the target flinch. Fails if the target did not select a priority move for use this turn, or if the target moves before the user.
moves.shortDesc: 100% flinch. Fails unless target using priority.

moves.name: Instruct
moves.desc: The target immediately uses its last used move. Fails if the target has not made a move, if the move has 0 PP, if the target is preparing to use Beak Blast, Focus Punch, or Shell Trap, or if the move is Assist, Beak Blast, Belch, Bide, Blazing Torque, Celebrate, Chatter, Combat Torque, Copycat, Dynamax Cannon, Focus Punch, Hold Hands, Ice Ball, Instruct, King's Shield, Magical Torque, Me First, Metronome, Mimic, Mirror Move, Nature Power, Noxious Torque, Obstruct, Outrage, Petal Dance, Rollout, Shell Trap, Sketch, Sleep Talk, Struggle, Thrash, Transform, Uproar, Wicked Torque, any two-turn move, or any recharge move.
moves.shortDesc: The target immediately uses its last used move.

moves.name: Tailwind
moves.desc: For 4 turns, the user and its party members have their Speed doubled. Fails if this move is already in effect for the user's side.
moves.shortDesc: For 4 turns, allies' Speed is doubled.

moves.name: Feint
moves.desc: If this move is successful, it breaks through the target's Baneful Bunker, Detect, King's Shield, Protect, or Spiky Shield for this turn, allowing other Pokemon to attack the target normally. If the target's side is protected by Crafty Shield, Mat Block, Quick Guard, or Wide Guard, that protection is also broken for this turn and other Pokemon may attack the target's side normally.
moves.shortDesc: Nullifies Detect, Protect, and Quick/Wide Guard.

moves.name: Perish Song
moves.desc: Each active Pokemon receives a perish count of 4 if it doesn't already have a perish count. At the end of each turn including the turn used, the perish count of all active Pokemon lowers by 1 and Pokemon faint if the number reaches 0. The perish count is removed from Pokemon that switch out. If a Pokemon uses Baton Pass while it has a perish count, the replacement will gain the perish count and continue to count down.
moves.shortDesc: All active Pokemon will faint in 3 turns.

moves.name: Protect
moves.desc: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Burning Bulwark, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Silk Trap, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn.
moves.shortDesc: Prevents moves from affecting the user this turn.

moves.name: Ice Shard
moves.desc: No additional effect.
moves.shortDesc: Usually goes first.

moves.name: Baton Pass
moves.desc: The user is replaced with another Pokemon in its party. The selected Pokemon has the user's stat stage changes, confusion, and certain move effects transferred to it.
moves.shortDesc: User switches, passing stat changes and more.

moves.name: Haze
moves.desc: Resets the stat stages of all active Pokemon to 0.
moves.shortDesc: Eliminates all stat changes.

moves.name: Trick Room
moves.desc: For 5 turns, the Speed of every Pokemon is recalculated for the purposes of determining turn order. During the effect, each Pokemon's Speed is considered to be (10000 - its normal Speed), and if this value is greater than 8191, 8192 is subtracted from it. If this move is used during the effect, the effect ends.
moves.shortDesc: Goes last. For 5 turns, turn order is reversed.

moves.name: Accelerock
moves.desc: No additional effect.
moves.shortDesc: Usually goes first.

moves.name: Transform
moves.desc: The user transforms into the target. The target's current stats, stat stages, types, moves, Ability, weight, gender, and sprite are copied. The user's level and HP remain the same and each copied move receives only 5 PP, with a maximum of 5 PP each. The user can no longer change formes if it would have the ability to do so. This move fails if it hits a substitute, if either the user or the target is already transformed, or if either is behind an Illusion.
moves.shortDesc: Copies target's stats, moves, types, and Ability.

moves.name: Salt Cure
moves.desc: Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/4 if the target is Steel or Water type), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. This effect ends when the target is no longer active.
moves.shortDesc: Deals 1/8 max HP each turn; 1/4 on Steel, Water.

moves.name: Memento
moves.desc: Lowers the target's Attack and Special Attack by 2 stages. The user faints unless this move misses or there is no target. Fails entirely if this move hits a substitute, but does not fail if the target's stats cannot be changed.
moves.shortDesc: Lowers target's Attack, Sp. Atk by 2. User faints.

moves.name: Helping Hand
moves.desc: The power of the target's attack this turn is multiplied by 1.5 (this effect is stackable). Fails if there is no ally adjacent to the user or if the ally already moved this turn, but does not fail if the ally is using a two-turn move.
moves.shortDesc: One adjacent ally's move power is 1.5x this turn.

moves.name: Surging Strikes
moves.desc: Hits three times. This move is always a critical hit unless the target is under the effect of Lucky Chant or has the Battle Armor or Shell Armor Abilities.
moves.shortDesc: Always results in a critical hit. Hits 3 times.

moves.name: Metal Burst
moves.desc: Deals damage to the last opposing Pokemon to hit the user with a physical or special attack this turn equal to 1.5 times the HP lost by the user from that attack, rounded down. If the user did not lose HP from that attack, this move deals 1 HP of damage instead. If that opposing Pokemon's position is no longer in use and there is another opposing Pokemon on the field, the damage is done to it instead. Only the last hit of a multi-hit attack is counted. Fails if the user was not hit by an opposing Pokemon's physical or special attack this turn.
moves.shortDesc: If hit by an attack, returns 1.5x damage.

moves.name: Acid Spray
moves.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 2 stages.
moves.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 2.

moves.name: Population Bomb
moves.desc: Hits ten times. This move checks accuracy for each hit, and the attack ends if the target avoids a hit. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit ten times. If the user is holding Loaded Dice, this move hits four to ten times at random without checking accuracy between hits.
moves.shortDesc: Hits 10 times. Each hit can miss.

moves.name: Shell Smash
moves.desc: Lowers the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage. Raises the user's Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by 2 stages.
moves.shortDesc: Lowers Def, SpD by 1; raises Atk, SpA, Spe by 2.

moves.name: Shed Tail
moves.desc: The user takes 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded up, and creates a substitute that has 1/4 of the user's maximum HP, rounded down. The user is replaced with another Pokemon in its party and the selected Pokemon has the substitute transferred to it. Fails if the user would faint, or if there are no unfainted party members.
moves.shortDesc: User takes 1/2 its max HP to pass a substitute.

moves.name: Detect
moves.desc: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Burning Bulwark, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Silk Trap, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn.
moves.shortDesc: Prevents moves from affecting the user this turn.

moves.name: Silk Trap
moves.desc: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn, and Pokemon trying to make contact with the user have their Speed lowered by 1 stage. Non-damaging moves go through this protection. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Burning Bulwark, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Silk Trap, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn.
moves.shortDesc: Protects from damaging attacks. Contact: -1 Spe.

moves.name: Skill Swap
moves.desc: The user swaps its Ability with the target's Ability. Fails if either the user or the target's Ability is As One, Battle Bond, Comatose, Commander, Disguise, Embody Aspect, Hunger Switch, Ice Face, Illusion, Multitype, Neutralizing Gas, Poison Puppeteer, Power Construct, Protosynthesis, Quark Drive, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, Tera Shell, Tera Shift, Teraform Zero, Wonder Guard, Zen Mode, or Zero to Hero.
moves.shortDesc: The user and the target trade Abilities.

moves.name: Acupressure
moves.desc: Raises a random stat by 2 stages as long as the stat is not already at stage 6. The user can choose to use this move on itself or an adjacent ally. Fails if no stat stage can be raised or if used on an ally with a substitute.
moves.shortDesc: Raises a random stat of the user or an ally by 2.

moves.name: Bullet Punch
moves.desc: No additional effect.
moves.shortDesc: Usually goes first.

moves.name: Lunar Blessing
moves.desc: Each Pokemon on the user's side restores 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded half up, and has its status condition cured.
moves.shortDesc: User and allies: healed 1/4 max HP, status cured.

moves.name: Entrainment
moves.desc: Causes the target's Ability to become the same as the user's. Fails if the target's Ability is As One, Battle Bond, Comatose, Disguise, Gulp Missile, Ice Face, Multitype, Power Construct, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, Tera Shift, Truant, Zen Mode, or Zero to Hero, or the same Ability as the user, or if the user's Ability is As One, Battle Bond, Comatose, Commander, Disguise, Embody Aspect, Flower Gift, Forecast, Hunger Switch, Ice Face, Illusion, Imposter, Multitype, Neutralizing Gas, Poison Puppeteer, Power Construct, Power of Alchemy, Protosynthesis, Quark Drive, Receiver, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, Tera Shell, Tera Shift, Teraform Zero, Trace, Wonder Guard, Zen Mode, or Zero to Hero.
moves.shortDesc: The target's Ability changes to match the user's.

moves.name: Extreme Speed
moves.desc: No additional effect.
moves.shortDesc: Nearly always goes first.

moves.name: Horn Drill
moves.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to the target's maximum HP. Ignores accuracy and evasiveness modifiers. This attack's accuracy is equal to (user's level - target's level + 30)%, and fails if the target is at a higher level. Pokemon with the Sturdy Ability are immune.
moves.shortDesc: OHKOs the target. Fails if user is a lower level.

moves.name: Destiny Bond
moves.desc: Until the user's next move, if an opposing Pokemon's attack knocks the user out, that Pokemon faints as well, unless the attack was Doom Desire or Future Sight. Fails if the user used this move successfully as its last move, disregarding moves used through the Dancer Ability.
moves.shortDesc: If an opponent knocks out the user, it also faints.

moves.name: Beat Up
moves.desc: Hits one time for the user and one time for each unfainted Pokemon without a non-volatile status condition in the user's party. The power of each hit is equal to 5+(X/10), where X is each participating Pokemon's base Attack; each hit is considered to come from the user.
moves.shortDesc: All healthy allies aid in damaging the target.

moves.name: Clangorous Soul
moves.desc: Raises the user's Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 1 stage in exchange for the user losing 33% of its maximum HP, rounded down. Fails if the user would faint or if its Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed stat stages would not change.
moves.shortDesc: User loses 33% of its max HP. +1 to all stats.

moves.name: Self-Destruct
moves.desc: The user faints after using this move, even if this move fails for having no target. This move is prevented from executing if any active Pokemon has the Damp Ability.
moves.shortDesc: Hits adjacent Pokemon. The user faints.

moves.name: Imprison
moves.desc: The user prevents all opposing Pokemon from using any moves that the user also knows as long as the user remains active.
moves.shortDesc: No foe can use any move known by the user.

moves.name: Minimize
moves.desc: Raises the user's evasiveness by 2 stages. Whether or not the user's evasiveness was changed, Body Slam, Dragon Rush, Flying Press, Heat Crash, Heavy Slam, Malicious Moonsault, Steamroller, and Stomp will not check accuracy and have their damage doubled if used against the user while it is active.
moves.shortDesc: Raises the user's evasiveness by 2.

moves.name: Encore
moves.desc: For its next 3 turns, the target is forced to repeat its last move used. If the affected move runs out of PP, the effect ends. Fails if the target is already under this effect, if it has not made a move, if the move has 0 PP, or if the move is Assist, Blazing Torque, Combat Torque, Copycat, Dynamax Cannon, Encore, Magical Torque, Me First, Metronome, Mimic, Mirror Move, Nature Power, Noxious Torque, Sketch, Sleep Talk, Struggle, Transform, or Wicked Torque.
moves.shortDesc: Target repeats its last move for its next 3 turns.

moves.name: Pollen Puff
moves.desc: If the target is an ally, this move restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded down, instead of dealing damage.
moves.shortDesc: If the target is an ally, heals 50% of its max HP.

moves.name: Night Shade
moves.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to the user's level.
moves.shortDesc: Does damage equal to the user's level.

moves.name: Sticky Web
moves.desc: Sets up a hazard on the opposing side of the field, lowering the Speed by 1 stage of each opposing Pokemon that switches in, unless it is a Flying-type Pokemon or has the Levitate Ability. Fails if the effect is already active on the opposing side. Can be removed from the opposing side if any opposing Pokemon uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Defog successfully, or is hit by Defog.
moves.shortDesc: Lowers Speed of grounded foes by 1 on switch-in.

moves.name: Will-O-Wisp
moves.desc: Burns the target.
moves.shortDesc: Burns the target.

moves.name: Stealth Rock
moves.desc: Sets up a hazard on the opposing side of the field, damaging each opposing Pokemon that switches in. Fails if the effect is already active on the opposing side. Foes lose 1/32, 1/16, 1/8, 1/4, or 1/2 of their maximum HP, rounded down, based on their weakness to the Rock type; 0.25x, 0.5x, neutral, 2x, or 4x, respectively. Can be removed from the opposing side if any opposing Pokemon uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Defog successfully, or is hit by Defog.
moves.shortDesc: Hurts foes on switch-in. Factors Rock weakness.

moves.name: Sheer Cold
moves.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to the target's maximum HP. Ignores accuracy and evasiveness modifiers. This attack's accuracy is equal to (user's level - target's level + X)%, where X is 30 if the user is an Ice type and 20 otherwise, and fails if the target is at a higher level. Ice-type Pokemon and Pokemon with the Sturdy Ability are immune.
moves.shortDesc: OHKOs non-Ice targets. Fails if user's lower level.

moves.name: Fissure
moves.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to the target's maximum HP. Ignores accuracy and evasiveness modifiers. This attack's accuracy is equal to (user's level - target's level + 30)%, and fails if the target is at a higher level. Pokemon with the Sturdy Ability are immune.
moves.shortDesc: OHKOs the target. Fails if user is a lower level.

moves.name: Flip Turn
moves.desc: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, the user switches out even if it is trapped and is replaced immediately by a selected party member. The user does not switch out if there are no unfainted party members, or if the target switched out using an Eject Button or through the effect of the Emergency Exit or Wimp Out Abilities.
moves.shortDesc: User switches out after damaging the target.

moves.name: Lunar Dance
moves.desc: The user faints, and if the Pokemon brought out to replace it does not have full HP or PP, or has a non-volatile status condition, its HP and PP are fully restored along with having any non-volatile status condition cured. The replacement is sent out at the end of the turn, and the healing happens before hazards take effect. This effect continues until a Pokemon that meets any of these conditions switches in at the user's position or gets swapped into the position with Ally Switch. Fails if the user is the last unfainted Pokemon in its party.
moves.shortDesc: User faints. Next hurt Pkmn is cured, max HP/PP.

moves.name: Ally Switch
moves.desc: The user swaps positions with its ally. Fails if the user is the only Pokemon on its side. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails or if the user's last move used is not Ally Switch.
moves.shortDesc: User and ally swap positions; using again can fail.

moves.name: Trick
moves.desc: The user swaps its held item with the target's held item. Fails if either the user or the target is holding a Mail or Z-Crystal, if neither is holding an item, if the user is trying to give or take a Mega Stone to or from the species that can Mega Evolve with it, or if the user is trying to give or take a Blue Orb, a Red Orb, a Griseous Orb, a Plate, a Drive, or a Memory to or from a Kyogre, a Groudon, a Giratina, an Arceus, a Genesect, or a Silvally, respectively. The target is immune to this move if it has the Sticky Hold Ability.
moves.shortDesc: User switches its held item with the target's.

moves.name: Soak
moves.desc: Causes the target to become a Water type. Fails if the target is an Arceus or a Silvally, if the target is already purely Water type, or if the target is Terastallized.
moves.shortDesc: Changes the target's type to Water.

moves.name: Ceaseless Edge
moves.desc: If this move is successful, it sets up a hazard on the opposing side of the field, damaging each opposing Pokemon that switches in, unless it is a Flying-type Pokemon or has the Levitate Ability. A maximum of three layers may be set, and opponents lose 1/8 of their maximum HP with one layer, 1/6 of their maximum HP with two layers, and 1/4 of their maximum HP with three layers, all rounded down. Can be removed from the opposing side if any opposing Pokemon uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Defog successfully, or is hit by Defog.
moves.shortDesc: Sets a layer of Spikes on the opposing side.

moves.name: Super Fang
moves.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to half of its current HP, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP.
moves.shortDesc: Does damage equal to 1/2 target's current HP.

moves.name: Misty Explosion
moves.desc: If the current terrain is Misty Terrain and the user is grounded, this move's power is multiplied by 1.5. The user faints after using this move, even if this move fails for having no target. This move is prevented from executing if any active Pokemon has the Damp Ability.
moves.shortDesc: User faints. User on Misty Terrain: 1.5x power.

moves.name: U-turn
moves.desc: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, the user switches out even if it is trapped and is replaced immediately by a selected party member. The user does not switch out if there are no unfainted party members, or if the target switched out using an Eject Button or through the effect of the Emergency Exit or Wimp Out Abilities.
moves.shortDesc: User switches out after damaging the target.

moves.name: Toxic Spikes
moves.desc: Sets up a hazard on the opposing side of the field, poisoning each opposing Pokemon that switches in, unless it is a Flying-type Pokemon or has the Levitate Ability. Can be used up to two times before failing. Opposing Pokemon become poisoned with one layer and badly poisoned with two layers. Can be removed from the opposing side if any opposing Pokemon uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Defog successfully, is hit by Defog, or a grounded Poison-type Pokemon switches in. Safeguard prevents the opposing party from being poisoned on switch-in, but a substitute does not.
moves.shortDesc: Poisons grounded foes on switch-in. Max 2 layers.

moves.name: Mortal Spin
moves.desc: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, the effects of Leech Seed and binding moves end for the user, and all hazards are removed from the user's side of the field. Has a 100% chance to poison the target.
moves.shortDesc: Poisons foes, frees user from hazards/bind/leech.

moves.name: Earthquake
moves.desc: Damage doubles if the target is using Dig.
moves.shortDesc: Hits adjacent Pokemon. Double damage on Dig.

moves.name: Sleep Powder
moves.desc: Causes the target to fall asleep.
moves.shortDesc: Causes the target to fall asleep.

moves.name: No Retreat
moves.desc: Raises the user's Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 1 stage, but it becomes prevented from switching out. The user can still switch out if it uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the user leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. Fails if the user has already been prevented from switching by this effect.
moves.shortDesc: Raises all stats by 1 (not acc/eva). Traps user.

moves.name: Knock Off
moves.desc: If the target is holding an item that can be removed from it, ignoring the Sticky Hold Ability, this move's power is multiplied by 1.5. If the user has not fainted, the target loses its held item. This move cannot cause Pokemon with the Sticky Hold Ability to lose their held item or cause a Kyogre, a Groudon, a Giratina, an Arceus, a Genesect, a Silvally, a Zacian, or a Zamazenta to lose their Blue Orb, Red Orb, Griseous Orb, Plate, Drive, Memory, Rusted Sword, or Rusted Shield respectively. Items lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle or the Harvest Ability.
moves.shortDesc: 1.5x damage if foe holds an item. Removes item.

moves.name: Substitute
moves.desc: The user takes 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down, and puts it into a substitute to take its place in battle. The substitute is removed once enough damage is inflicted on it, or if the user switches out or faints. Baton Pass can be used to transfer the substitute to an ally, and the substitute will keep its remaining HP. Until the substitute is broken, it receives damage from all attacks made by other Pokemon and shields the user from status effects and stat stage changes caused by other Pokemon. Sound-based moves and Pokemon with the Infiltrator Ability ignore substitutes. The user still takes normal damage from weather and status effects while behind its substitute. If the substitute breaks during a multi-hit attack, the user will take damage from any remaining hits. If a substitute is created while the user is trapped by a binding move, the binding effect ends immediately. Fails if the user does not have enough HP remaining to create a substitute without fainting, or if it already has a substitute.
moves.shortDesc: User takes 1/4 its max HP to put in a substitute.

moves.name: Simple Beam
moves.desc: Causes the target's Ability to become Simple. Fails if the target's Ability is As One, Battle Bond, Comatose, Disguise, Gulp Missile, Ice Face, Multitype, Power Construct, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Simple, Stance Change, Tera Shift, Truant, Zen Mode, or Zero to Hero.
moves.shortDesc: The target's Ability becomes Simple.

moves.name: Gravity
moves.desc: For 5 turns, the evasiveness of all active Pokemon is multiplied by 0.6. At the time of use, Bounce, Fly, Magnet Rise, Sky Drop, and Telekinesis end immediately for all active Pokemon. During the effect, Bounce, Fly, Flying Press, High Jump Kick, Jump Kick, Magnet Rise, Sky Drop, Splash, and Telekinesis are prevented from being used by all active Pokemon. Ground-type attacks, Spikes, Toxic Spikes, Sticky Web, and the Arena Trap Ability can affect Flying types or Pokemon with the Levitate Ability. Fails if this move is already in effect.
moves.shortDesc: 5 turns: no Ground immunities, 1.67x accuracy.

moves.name: Nuzzle
moves.desc: Has a 100% chance to paralyze the target.
moves.shortDesc: 100% chance to paralyze the target.

moves.name: Healing Wish
moves.desc: The user faints, and if the Pokemon brought out to replace it does not have full HP or has a non-volatile status condition, its HP is fully restored along with having any non-volatile status condition cured. The replacement is sent out at the end of the turn, and the healing happens before hazards take effect. This effect continues until a Pokemon that meets either of these conditions switches in at the user's position or gets swapped into the position with Ally Switch. Fails if the user is the last unfainted Pokemon in its party.
moves.shortDesc: User faints. Next hurt Pokemon is fully healed.

moves.name: Floral Healing
moves.desc: The target restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up. If the terrain is Grassy Terrain, the target instead restores 2/3 of its maximum HP, rounded half down.
moves.shortDesc: Heals the target by 50% of its max HP.

moves.name: Strength Sap
moves.desc: Lowers the target's Attack by 1 stage. The user restores its HP equal to the target's Attack stat calculated with its stat stage before this move was used. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down. Fails if the target's Attack stat stage is -6.
moves.shortDesc: User heals HP=target's Atk stat. Lowers Atk by 1.

moves.name: Lock-On
moves.desc: Until the end of the next turn, the target cannot avoid the user's moves, even if the target is in the middle of a two-turn move. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field. Fails if this effect is active for the user.
moves.shortDesc: User's next move will not miss the target.

moves.name: Sunny Day
moves.desc: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Sunny Day. The damage of Fire-type attacks is multiplied by 1.5 and the damage of Water-type attacks is multiplied by 0.5 during the effect. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Heat Rock. Fails if the current weather is Sunny Day.
moves.shortDesc: For 5 turns, intense sunlight powers Fire moves.

moves.name: Victory Dance
moves.desc: Raises the user's Attack, Defense, and Speed by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: Raises the user's Attack, Defense, Speed by 1.

moves.name: Foul Play
moves.desc: Damage is calculated using the target's Attack stat, including stat stage changes. The user's Ability, item, and burn are used as normal.
moves.shortDesc: Uses target's Attack stat in damage calculation.

moves.name: Reflect
moves.desc: For 5 turns, the user and its party members take 0.5x damage from physical attacks, or 0.66x damage if in a Double Battle. Damage is not reduced further with Aurora Veil. Critical hits ignore this effect. It is removed from the user's side if the user or an ally is successfully hit by Brick Break, Psychic Fangs, or Defog. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Light Clay. Fails if the effect is already active on the user's side.
moves.shortDesc: For 5 turns, physical damage to allies is halved.

moves.name: Dire Claw
moves.desc: Has a 50% chance to cause the target to either fall asleep, become poisoned, or become paralyzed.
moves.shortDesc: 50% chance to sleep, poison, or paralyze target.

moves.name: Thunderclap
moves.desc: Fails if the target did not select a physical attack, special attack, or Me First for use this turn, or if the target moves before the user.
moves.shortDesc: Usually goes first. Fails if target is not attacking.

moves.name: Power Trip
moves.desc: Power is equal to 20+(X*20), where X is the user's total stat stage changes that are greater than 0.
moves.shortDesc: + 20 power for each of the user's stat boosts.

moves.name: Doodle
moves.desc: The user and its ally's Abilities change to match the target's Ability. Does not change Ability if the user's or its ally's is As One, Battle Bond, Comatose, Disguise, Gulp Missile, Ice Face, Multitype, Power Construct, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, Tera Shift, Zen Mode, Zero to Hero, or already matches the target. Fails if both the user and its ally's Ability already matches the target, or if the target's Ability is As One, Battle Bond, Comatose, Commander, Disguise, Embody Aspect, Flower Gift, Forecast, Hunger Switch, Ice Face, Illusion, Imposter, Multitype, Neutralizing Gas, Poison Puppeteer, Power Construct, Power of Alchemy, Protosynthesis, Quark Drive, Receiver, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, Tera Shell, Tera Shift, Teraform Zero, Trace, Wonder Guard, Zen Mode, or Zero to Hero.
moves.shortDesc: User and ally's Abilities become target's Ability.

moves.name: Misty Terrain
moves.desc: For 5 turns, the terrain becomes Misty Terrain. During the effect, the power of Dragon-type attacks used against grounded Pokemon is multiplied by 0.5 and grounded Pokemon cannot be inflicted with a non-volatile status condition nor confusion. Grounded Pokemon can become affected by Yawn but cannot fall asleep from its effect. Camouflage transforms the user into a Fairy type, Nature Power becomes Moonblast, and Secret Power has a 30% chance to lower Special Attack by 1 stage. Fails if the current terrain is Misty Terrain.
moves.shortDesc: 5 turns. Can't status,-Dragon power vs grounded.

moves.name: Belly Drum
moves.desc: Raises the user's Attack by 12 stages in exchange for the user losing 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded down. Fails if the user would faint or if its Attack stat stage is 6.
moves.shortDesc: User loses 50% max HP. Maximizes Attack.

moves.name: Light Screen
moves.desc: For 5 turns, the user and its party members take 0.5x damage from special attacks, or 0.66x damage if in a Double Battle. Damage is not reduced further with Aurora Veil. Critical hits ignore this effect. It is removed from the user's side if the user or an ally is successfully hit by Brick Break, Psychic Fangs, or Defog. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Light Clay. Fails if the effect is already active on the user's side.
moves.shortDesc: For 5 turns, special damage to allies is halved.

moves.name: Icy Wind
moves.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the foe(s) Speed by 1.

moves.name: Tar Shot
moves.desc: Lowers the target's Speed by 1 stage. Until the target switches out, the effectiveness of Fire-type moves is doubled against it.
moves.shortDesc: Target gets -1 Spe and becomes weaker to Fire.

moves.name: Endure
moves.desc: The user will survive attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn with at least 1 HP. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Burning Bulwark, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Silk Trap, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn.
moves.shortDesc: User survives attacks this turn with at least 1 HP.

moves.name: Rapid Spin
moves.desc: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, the effects of Leech Seed and binding moves end for the user, and all hazards are removed from the user's side of the field. Has a 100% chance to raise the user's Speed by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: Free user from hazards/bind/Leech Seed; +1 Spe.

moves.name: Quiver Dance
moves.desc: Raises the user's Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: Raises the user's Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, Speed by 1.

moves.name: Worry Seed
moves.desc: Causes the target's Ability to become Insomnia. Fails if the target's Ability is As One, Battle Bond, Comatose, Disguise, Gulp Missile, Ice Face, Insomnia, Multitype, Power Construct, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, Tera Shift, Truant, Zen Mode, or Zero to Hero.
moves.shortDesc: The target's Ability becomes Insomnia.

moves.name: Shadow Sneak
moves.desc: No additional effect.
moves.shortDesc: Usually goes first.

moves.name: Shift Gear
moves.desc: Raises the user's Speed by 2 stages and its Attack by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: Raises the user's Speed by 2 and Attack by 1.

moves.name: Alluring Voice
moves.desc: Has a 100% chance to confuse the target if it had a stat stage raised this turn.
moves.shortDesc: 100% confuse target that had a stat rise this turn.

moves.name: Clear Smog
moves.desc: Resets all of the target's stat stages to 0.
moves.shortDesc: Resets all of the target's stat stages to 0.

moves.name: Rain Dance
moves.desc: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Rain Dance. The damage of Water-type attacks is multiplied by 1.5 and the damage of Fire-type attacks is multiplied by 0.5 during the effect. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Damp Rock. Fails if the current weather is Rain Dance.
moves.shortDesc: For 5 turns, heavy rain powers Water moves.

moves.name: Dazzling Gleam
moves.desc: No additional effect.
moves.shortDesc: No additional effect. Hits adjacent foes.

moves.name: Recover
moves.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up.
moves.shortDesc: Heals the user by 50% of its max HP.

moves.name: Water Pledge
moves.desc: If one of the user's allies chose to use Fire Pledge or Grass Pledge this turn and has not moved yet, it takes its turn immediately after the user and the user's move does nothing. If combined with Fire Pledge, the ally uses Water Pledge with 150 power and a rainbow appears on the user's side for 4 turns, which doubles secondary effect chances and stacks with the Serene Grace Ability, except effects that cause flinching can only have their chance doubled once. If combined with Grass Pledge, the ally uses Grass Pledge with 150 power and a swamp appears on the target's side for 4 turns, which quarters the Speed of each Pokemon on that side. When used as a combined move, this move gains STAB no matter what the user's type is. This move does not consume the user's Water Gem, and cannot be redirected by the Storm Drain Ability.
moves.shortDesc: Use with Grass or Fire Pledge for added effect.

moves.name: Fake Tears
moves.desc: Lowers the target's Special Defense by 2 stages.
moves.shortDesc: Lowers the target's Sp. Def by 2.

moves.name: Aqua Step
moves.desc: Has a 100% chance to raise the user's Speed by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: 100% chance to raise the user's Speed by 1.

moves.name: Frost Breath
moves.desc: This move is always a critical hit unless the target is under the effect of Lucky Chant or has the Battle Armor or Shell Armor Abilities.
moves.shortDesc: Always results in a critical hit.

moves.name: Stone Axe
moves.desc: If this move is successful, it sets up a hazard on the opposing side of the field, damaging each opposing Pokemon that switches in. Foes lose 1/32, 1/16, 1/8, 1/4, or 1/2 of their maximum HP, rounded down, based on their weakness to the Rock type; 0.25x, 0.5x, neutral, 2x, or 4x, respectively. Can be removed from the opposing side if any opposing Pokemon uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Defog successfully, or is hit by Defog.
moves.shortDesc: Sets Stealth Rock on the target's side.

moves.name: Spirit Shackle
moves.desc: Prevents the target from switching out. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. The effect ends if the user leaves the field.
moves.shortDesc: Prevents the target from switching out.

moves.name: Dragon Cheer
moves.desc: Raises the target's chance for a critical hit by 1 stage, or by 2 stages if the target is Dragon type. Fails if there is no ally adjacent to the user, or if the target already has this effect or the Focus Energy effect. Baton Pass can be used to transfer this effect to an ally.
moves.shortDesc: Ally: Crit ratio +1, or +2 if ally is Dragon type.

moves.name: Heal Pulse
moves.desc: The target restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up. If the user has the Mega Launcher Ability, the target instead restores 3/4 of its maximum HP, rounded half down.
moves.shortDesc: Heals the target by 50% of its max HP.

moves.name: Infestation
moves.desc: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns (seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw). Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Shed Tail, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.
moves.shortDesc: Traps and damages the target for 4-5 turns.

moves.name: Psych Up
moves.desc: The user copies all of the target's current stat stage changes.
moves.shortDesc: Copies the target's current stat stages.

moves.name: Agility
moves.desc: Raises the user's Speed by 2 stages.
moves.shortDesc: Raises the user's Speed by 2.

moves.name: Hypnosis
moves.desc: Causes the target to fall asleep.
moves.shortDesc: Causes the target to fall asleep.

moves.name: Electric Terrain
moves.desc: For 5 turns, the terrain becomes Electric Terrain. During the effect, the power of Electric-type attacks made by grounded Pokemon is multiplied by 1.3 and grounded Pokemon cannot fall asleep; Pokemon already asleep do not wake up. Grounded Pokemon cannot become affected by Yawn or fall asleep from its effect. Camouflage transforms the user into an Electric type, Nature Power becomes Thunderbolt, and Secret Power has a 30% chance to cause paralysis. Fails if the current terrain is Electric Terrain.
moves.shortDesc: 5 turns. Grounded: +Electric power, can't sleep.

moves.name: Charm
moves.desc: Lowers the target's Attack by 2 stages.
moves.shortDesc: Lowers the target's Attack by 2.

moves.name: Glare
moves.desc: Paralyzes the target.
moves.shortDesc: Paralyzes the target.

moves.name: Bitter Malice
moves.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1.

moves.name: Headbutt
moves.desc: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
moves.shortDesc: 30% chance to make the target flinch.

moves.name: Bitter Blade
moves.desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
moves.shortDesc: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.

moves.name: Matcha Gotcha
moves.desc: Has a 20% chance to burn the target. The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down. The target thaws out if it is frozen.
moves.shortDesc: 20% burn. Recovers 50% dmg dealt. Thaws foe(s).

moves.name: Recycle
moves.desc: The user regains the item it last used. Fails if the user is holding an item, if the user has not held an item, if the item was a popped Air Balloon, if the item was picked up by a Pokemon with the Pickup Ability, or if the item was lost to Bug Bite, Corrosive Gas, Covet, Incinerate, Knock Off, Pluck, or Thief. Items thrown with Fling can be regained.
moves.shortDesc: Restores the item the user last used.

moves.name: Stored Power
moves.desc: Power is equal to 20+(X*20), where X is the user's total stat stage changes that are greater than 0.
moves.shortDesc: + 20 power for each of the user's stat boosts.

moves.name: Spicy Extract
moves.desc: Raises the target's Attack by 2 stages and lowers its Defense by 2 stages.
moves.shortDesc: Raises target's Atk by 2 and lowers its Def by 2.

moves.name: Gastro Acid
moves.desc: Causes the target's Ability to be rendered ineffective as long as it remains active. If the target uses Baton Pass, the replacement will remain under this effect. If the target's Ability is As One, Battle Bond, Comatose, Disguise, Gulp Missile, Ice Face, Multitype, Power Construct, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, Tera Shift, Zen Mode, or Zero to Hero, this move fails, and receiving the effect through Baton Pass ends the effect immediately.
moves.shortDesc: Nullifies the target's Ability.

moves.name: Rage Powder
moves.desc: Until the end of the turn, all single-target attacks from the opposing side are redirected to the user. Such attacks are redirected to the user before they can be reflected by Magic Coat or the Magic Bounce Ability, or drawn in by the Lightning Rod or Storm Drain Abilities. Fails if it is not a Double Battle or Battle Royal. This effect is ignored while the user is under the effect of Sky Drop.
moves.shortDesc: The foes' moves target the user on the turn used.

moves.name: Flower Trick
moves.desc: This move is always a critical hit unless the target is under the effect of Lucky Chant or has the Battle Armor or Shell Armor Abilities. This move does not check accuracy.
moves.shortDesc: Always results in a critical hit; no accuracy check.

moves.name: Facade
moves.desc: Power doubles if the user is burned, paralyzed, or poisoned. The physical damage halving effect from the user's burn is ignored.
moves.shortDesc: Power doubles if user is burn/poison/paralyzed.

moves.name: Cotton Guard
moves.desc: Raises the user's Defense by 3 stages.
moves.shortDesc: Raises the user's Defense by 3.

moves.name: Amnesia
moves.desc: Raises the user's Special Defense by 2 stages.
moves.shortDesc: Raises the user's Sp. Def by 2.

moves.name: Seismic Toss
moves.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to the user's level.
moves.shortDesc: Does damage equal to the user's level.

moves.name: Disable
moves.desc: For 4 turns, the target's last move used becomes disabled. Fails if one of the target's moves is already disabled, if the target has not made a move, if the target no longer knows the move, or if the move was a Max or G-Max Move.
moves.shortDesc: For 4 turns, disables the target's last move used.

moves.name: Chilling Water
moves.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1.

moves.name: Spirit Break
moves.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's Sp. Atk by 1.

moves.name: Thunder Wave
moves.desc: Paralyzes the target. This move does not ignore type immunity.
moves.shortDesc: Paralyzes the target.

moves.name: Chilly Reception
moves.desc: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Snow. The user switches out even if it is trapped and is replaced immediately by a selected party member. The user does not switch out if there are no unfainted party members.
moves.shortDesc: Starts Snow. User switches out.

moves.name: Aura Wheel
moves.desc: Has a 100% chance to raise the user's Speed by 1 stage. If the user is a Morpeko in Full Belly Mode, this move is Electric type. If the user is a Morpeko in Hangry Mode, this move is Dark type. This move cannot be used successfully unless the user's current form, while considering Transform, is Full Belly or Hangry Mode Morpeko.
moves.shortDesc: Morpeko: Electric; Hangry: Dark; 100% +1 Spe.

moves.name: Hyper Drill
moves.desc: Bypasses protection without breaking it.
moves.shortDesc: Bypasses protection without breaking it.

moves.name: Acid Armor
moves.desc: Raises the user's Defense by 2 stages.
moves.shortDesc: Raises the user's Defense by 2.

moves.name: Switcheroo
moves.desc: The user swaps its held item with the target's held item. Fails if either the user or the target is holding a Mail or Z-Crystal, if neither is holding an item, if the user is trying to give or take a Mega Stone to or from the species that can Mega Evolve with it, or if the user is trying to give or take a Blue Orb, a Red Orb, a Griseous Orb, a Plate, a Drive, or a Memory to or from a Kyogre, a Groudon, a Giratina, an Arceus, a Genesect, or a Silvally, respectively. The target is immune to this move if it has the Sticky Hold Ability.
moves.shortDesc: User switches its held item with the target's.

moves.name: Blood Moon
moves.desc: Cannot be selected the turn after it's used.
moves.shortDesc: Cannot be selected the turn after it's used.

moves.name: Drain Punch
moves.desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
moves.shortDesc: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.

moves.name: Apple Acid
moves.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.

moves.name: Coil
moves.desc: Raises the user's Attack, Defense, and accuracy by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: Raises user's Attack, Defense, accuracy by 1.

moves.name: Draining Kiss
moves.desc: The user recovers 3/4 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
moves.shortDesc: User recovers 75% of the damage dealt.

moves.name: Court Change
moves.desc: Switches the Mist, Light Screen, Reflect, Spikes, Safeguard, Tailwind, Toxic Spikes, Stealth Rock, Water Pledge, Fire Pledge, Grass Pledge, Sticky Web, Aurora Veil, G-Max Steelsurge, G-Max Cannonade, G-Max Vine Lash, and G-Max Wildfire effects from the user's side to the opposing side and vice versa.
moves.shortDesc: Swaps user's field effects with the opposing side.

moves.name: String Shot
moves.desc: Lowers the target's Speed by 2 stages.
moves.shortDesc: Lowers the foe(s) Speed by 2.

moves.name: Mirror Coat
moves.desc: Deals damage to the last opposing Pokemon to hit the user with a special attack this turn equal to twice the HP lost by the user from that attack. If the user did not lose HP from the attack, this move deals 1 HP of damage instead. If that opposing Pokemon's position is no longer in use and there is another opposing Pokemon on the field, the damage is done to it instead. Only the last hit of a multi-hit attack is counted. Fails if the user was not hit by an opposing Pokemon's special attack this turn.
moves.shortDesc: If hit by special attack, returns double damage.

moves.name: Counter
moves.desc: Deals damage to the last opposing Pokemon to hit the user with a physical attack this turn equal to twice the HP lost by the user from that attack. If the user did not lose HP from the attack, this move deals 1 HP of damage instead. If that opposing Pokemon's position is no longer in use and there is another opposing Pokemon on the field, the damage is done to it instead. Only the last hit of a multi-hit attack is counted. Fails if the user was not hit by an opposing Pokemon's physical attack this turn.
moves.shortDesc: If hit by physical attack, returns double damage.

moves.name: Steel Beam
moves.desc: Whether or not this move is successful and even if it would cause fainting, the user loses 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded up, unless the user has the Magic Guard Ability.
moves.shortDesc: User loses 50% max HP.

moves.name: Toxic
moves.desc: Badly poisons the target. If a Poison-type Pokemon uses this move, the target cannot avoid the attack, even if the target is in the middle of a two-turn move.
moves.shortDesc: Badly poisons the target. Poison types can't miss.

moves.name: Freeze-Dry
moves.desc: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target. This move's type effectiveness against Water is changed to be super effective no matter what this move's type is.
moves.shortDesc: 10% chance to freeze. Super effective on Water.

moves.name: Tail Glow
moves.desc: Raises the user's Special Attack by 3 stages.
moves.shortDesc: Raises the user's Sp. Atk by 3.

moves.name: Topsy-Turvy
moves.desc: The target's positive stat stages become negative and vice versa. Fails if all of the target's stat stages are 0.
moves.shortDesc: Inverts the target's stat stages.

moves.name: Scary Face
moves.desc: Lowers the target's Speed by 2 stages.
moves.shortDesc: Lowers the target's Speed by 2.

moves.name: Electroweb
moves.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the foe(s) Speed by 1.

moves.name: Roar
moves.desc: The target is forced to switch out and be replaced with a random unfainted ally. Fails if the target is the last unfainted Pokemon in its party, or if the target used Ingrain previously or has the Suction Cups Ability.
moves.shortDesc: Forces the target to switch to a random ally.

moves.name: Chloroblast

moves.name: Life Dew

moves.name: Focus Punch

Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Shed Tail, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.
moves.shortDesc: Traps and damages the target for 4-5 turns.

moves.name: Revelation Dance

If combined with Water Pledge, the ally uses Water Pledge with 150 power and a rainbow appears on the user's side for 4 turns, which doubles secondary effect chances and stacks with the Serene Grace Ability, except effects that cause flinching can only have their chance doubled once. When used as a combined move, this move gains STAB no matter what the user's type is. This move does not consume the user's Fire Gem.

moves.shortDesc: Lowers the target's Defense by 2.

moves.name: Grass Pledge
moves.desc: If one of the user's allies chose to use Fire Pledge or Water Pledge this turn and has not moved yet, it takes its turn immediately after the user and the user's move does nothing. If combined with Fire Pledge, the ally uses Fire Pledge with 150 power and a sea of fire appears on the target's side for 4 turns, which causes damage to non-Fire types equal to 1/8 of their maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect, including the last turn. If combined with Water Pledge, the ally uses Grass Pledge with 150 power and a swamp appears on the target's side for 4 turns, which quarters the Speed of each Pokemon on that side. When used as a combined move, this move gains STAB no matter what the user's type is. This move does not consume the user's Grass Gem.
moves.shortDesc: Use with Fire or Water Pledge for added effect.

moves.name: Double Hit
moves.desc: Hits twice. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit.
moves.shortDesc: Hits 2 times in one turn.

moves.name: Boomburst
moves.desc: No additional effect.
moves.shortDesc: No additional effect. Hits adjacent Pokemon.

moves.name: Psychic Noise
moves.desc: For 2 turns, the target is prevented from restoring any HP as long as it remains active. During the effect, healing and draining moves are unusable, and Abilities and items that grant healing will not heal the user. If an affected Pokemon uses Baton Pass, the replacement will remain unable to restore its HP. Pain Split and the Regenerator Ability are unaffected.
moves.shortDesc: For 2 turns, the target is prevented from healing.

moves.name: Aurora Veil
moves.desc: For 5 turns, the user and its party members take 0.5x damage from physical and special attacks, or 0.66x damage if in a Double Battle; does not reduce damage further with Reflect or Light Screen. Critical hits ignore this protection. It is removed from the user's side if the user or an ally is successfully hit by Brick Break, Psychic Fangs, or Defog. Brick Break and Psychic Fangs remove the effect before damage is calculated. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Light Clay. Fails unless the weather is Hail.
moves.shortDesc: For 5 turns, damage to allies halved. Snow only.

moves.name: Magma Storm
moves.desc: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns (seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw). Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Shed Tail, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.
moves.shortDesc: Traps and damages the target for 4-5 turns.

moves.name: Mean Look
moves.desc: Prevents the target from switching out. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. The effect ends if the user leaves the field.
moves.shortDesc: Prevents the target from switching out.

moves.name: Volt Switch
moves.desc: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, the user switches out even if it is trapped and is replaced immediately by a selected party member. The user does not switch out if there are no unfainted party members, or if the target switched out using an Eject Button or through the effect of the Emergency Exit or Wimp Out Abilities.
moves.shortDesc: User switches out after damaging the target.

moves.name: Growl
moves.desc: Lowers the target's Attack by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: Lowers the foe(s) Attack by 1.

moves.name: Speed Swap
moves.desc: The user swaps its Speed stat with the target. Stat stage changes are unaffected.
moves.shortDesc: Swaps Speed stat with target.

moves.name: Beak Blast
moves.desc: If the user is hit by a contact move this turn before it can execute this move, the attacker is burned.
moves.shortDesc: Burns on contact with the user before it moves.

moves.name: Shell Side Arm
moves.desc: Has a 20% chance to poison the target. This move becomes a physical attack that makes contact if the value of ((((2 * the user's level / 5 + 2) * 90 * X) / Y) / 50), where X is the user's Attack stat and Y is the target's Defense stat, is greater than the same value where X is the user's Special Attack stat and Y is the target's Special Defense stat. No stat modifiers other than stat stage changes are considered for this purpose. If the two values are equal, this move chooses a damage category at random.
moves.shortDesc: 20% psn. Physical+contact if it would be stronger.

moves.name: Rage Fist
moves.desc: Power is equal to 50+(X*50), where X is the total number of times the user has been hit by a damaging attack during the battle, even if the user did not lose HP from the attack. X cannot be greater than 6 and does not reset upon switching out or fainting. Each hit of a multi-hit attack is counted, but confusion damage is not counted.
moves.shortDesc: +50 power for each time user was hit. Max 6 hits.

moves.name: Teleport
moves.desc: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, the user switches out even if it is trapped and is replaced immediately by a selected party member. The user does not switch out if there are no unfainted party members.
moves.shortDesc: User switches out.

moves.name: Lava Plume
moves.desc: Has a 30% chance to burn the target.
moves.shortDesc: 30% chance to burn adjacent Pokemon.

moves.name: Teeter Dance
moves.desc: Causes the target to become confused.
moves.shortDesc: Confuses adjacent Pokemon.

moves.name: False Swipe

moves.name: Raging Bull

If the user's current form is a Paldean Tauros, this move's type changes to match. Fighting type for Combat Breed, Fire type for Blaze Breed, and Water type for Aqua Breed.
moves.shortDesc: Destroys screens. Type depends on user's form.

moves.name: Glaive Rush
moves.desc: If this move is successful, moves targeted at the user deal double damage and do not check accuracy until the user's next turn.
moves.shortDesc: User takes sure-hit 2x damage until its next turn.

moves.name: Infernal Parade

moves.shortDesc: 30% burn. 2x power if target is already statused.

moves.name: Pin Missile

moves.shortDesc: Hits 2-5 times in one turn.

moves.name: Sandstorm
moves.desc: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Sandstorm. At the end of each turn except the last, all active Pokemon lose 1/16 of their maximum HP, rounded down, unless they are a Ground, Rock, or Steel type, or have the Magic Guard, Overcoat, Sand Force, Sand Rush, or Sand Veil Abilities. During the effect, the Special Defense of Rock-type Pokemon is multiplied by 1.5 when taking damage from a special attack. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Smooth Rock. Fails if the current weather is Sandstorm.
moves.shortDesc: For 5 turns, a sandstorm rages. Rock: 1.5x SpD.

moves.name: Petal Dance
moves.desc: The user spends two or three turns locked into this move and becomes confused immediately after its move on the last turn of the effect if it is not already. This move targets an opposing Pokemon at random on each turn. If the user is prevented from moving, is asleep at the beginning of a turn, or the attack is not successful against the target on the first turn of the effect or the second turn of a three-turn effect, the effect ends without causing confusion. If this move is called by Sleep Talk and the user is asleep, the move is used for one turn and does not confuse the user.
moves.shortDesc: Lasts 2-3 turns. Confuses the user afterwards.

moves.name: Heal Bell
moves.desc: Every Pokemon in the user's party is cured of its non-volatile status condition. Active Pokemon with the Soundproof Ability are not cured, unless they are the user.
moves.shortDesc: Cures the user's party of all status conditions.

moves.name: Safeguard
moves.desc: For 5 turns, the user and its party members cannot have non-volatile status conditions or confusion inflicted on them by other Pokemon. Pokemon on the user's side cannot become affected by Yawn but can fall asleep from its effect. It is removed from the user's side if the user or an ally is successfully hit by Defog. Fails if the effect is already active on the user's side.
moves.shortDesc: For 5 turns, protects user's party from status.

moves.desc: Causes the target to become confused.

moves.name: Morning Sun

If there is no target or the target avoids this move by protecting itself, the user's held item is still lost. The user can regain a thrown item with Recycle or the Harvest Ability. Fails if the user has no held item, if the held item cannot be thrown, if the user is under the effect of Embargo or Magic Room, or if the user has the Klutz Ability.
moves.shortDesc: Flings the user's item at the target. Power varies.
